Question: Shenzhen Smiley Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Smiley Technology Co., Ltd

Electric Bikes

 - Focus on entrance level e-bikes
 - Production capacity: 1000pcs per day

Electric Scooters

 - Focus on entrance level e-scooters
 - Production capacity: 3000pcs per day

Features

 - Professional manufacturer since 2008
 - Services include OEM & ODM
 - Equipped with 4 production lines & 2 package lines
 - 7 professional engineers in R&D department
 - International business expansion since 2019
 - Warehouse in LA, USA with special prices during CES 2024
Summary_cn:

- 专注于入门级电动自行车
- 生产能力：每天1000辆

电动滑板车

- 专注于入门级电动滑板车
- 生产能力：每天3000辆

特点

- 自2008年以来的专业制造商
- 服务包括OEM和ODM
- 配备4条生产线和2条包装线
- 研发部门有7位专业工程师
- 自2019年以来进行国际业务拓展
- 在美国洛杉矶设有仓库，CES 2024期间有特别价格
